description:
While the other gods begin participating in clubs, only Takeru, god of the sea, stubbornly refuses to join one.
A concerned Yui unsuccessfully attempts to persuade him to join a club.
One day, Yui comes across Takeru practicing with swords.
When Takeru learns Yui has been practicing swordplay for years, he agrees to join a club if she beats him in a sword fight--?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 許されざる激情[こころ]
